website_summaries.verdict: A stylish industrial fan option for a variety of rooms and interior styles. Extremely budget friendly.
pros: Large span from the three fan blades make it easy to circulate a large amount of air in a normal-size room
cons: Steel finish will show more dust and dirt marks when not in use

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, including very thin metal blades
customer_reviews.text: Poor construction, including very thin metal blades. The rheostat [speed control] that was supplied was enormous, and unless you wanted to have it sticking out into the room about five inches, required cutting a hole in the wall and installing a electrical box. No excuse for that in todays available technology. A quick visit to big box store provided a switch that replaced the wall on off switch for the fan. Also, I need to clarify that this unit does not come with a light kit, the web page suggested that it did.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, Doesn't Seem to Move Much Air
customer_reviews.text: Put 2 of these in my workshop. They arrived in good condition, with no issues - were packed well. Great price, look good installed. The reason for the 3 stars is that they spin fast, but don't seem to move a lot of air. Standing under them you can feel a breeze, but there is zero danger in them kicking up any dust. :-) Mine are mounted with the blades about 9' off the ground. Fan speed controls worked fine though they are pretty big physically. Mounted mine in their own boxes, so no issues with trying to fit them into an existing switch's spot. They do seem to stir up the air but don't plan to be 'blown away'.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get to the chopppaaaaaaaa
customer_reviews.text: This thing pushes PLENTY of air. We replaced a 5 blade fan in our vaulted ceiling kitchen with this 3 blade fan. The main issue with it is the metal blades....literally CHOP the air...and sounds like a freaking helicopter echoing in my home. So...air = good. Noise = bad This would be great for a shop or something.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Fahmy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works pretty basic
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok doesn’t move much air Even on full speed But it looks ok pretty basic You get what you pay for!! It’s good for small room with low ceilings I would NOT buy another
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Bearings and Overheating
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my garage. The bottom bearing will seize and cause the fan to overheat and stop. At time of incident, temp reading at bottom of fan was 168*F. Don't bother replacing the bearings, the stator windings will open due to the temp increase. Now shopping for two fans for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Comes with an almost industrial hard wired controller. Mount the ceiling cone/trim/escutcheon loosely or about 3/32 from the ceiling to avoid a clicking sound from any wobble
customer_reviews.author: Home Pro

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: these fans push a lot of air but are noisy. Thank goodness we bought them for our garage, would be too noisy inside your home
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: 1. Late shipment. 2. This ventilator doesn't have a light that there is no information or warning about it on specs. 3. You have to pay for return! 4. You have to pay return shipment that that will cost you another $20.
customer_reviews.author: hasan keskin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No light. Downrod is long so I cut them to make them more sturdy. But the fan puts off lots of air.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Switch does not use standard trim. It all in ...
customer_reviews.text: Switch does not use standard trim. It all in one. So put in two Gang Box it will not work unless you cut the trim plate to fit
customer_reviews.author: David yee

customer_reviews.title: This does not have a standard rod
customer_reviews.text: The rod that extends from the ceiling is not the standard 3/4". It is 1/2" and there is only one, 12" long. So if you need a shorter rod you will not be able to find it at Lowe's or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan for the money, quiet and easy to install. I do not see anywhere it says it has a light. The round thing at the bottom of the picture is the motor, not a light. The only negative is that it is not reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great price and product along with fast shipping. Thank you 😁
customer_reviews.author: kdog

customer_reviews.title: No lights.  Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, but there are no lights like description claims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good fan for the price, works very well in my wood shop
customer_reviews.author: doodlerdave

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Little noisey but moves air well. The rod is only one length but you can cut it and drill new mounting holes and get the rod as short as about 6-8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fan's great, controller isn't...
customer_reviews.text: The fan is good quality, as others have said, though, the controller is a bit of a POS. That's easy enough to replace with something better. Keeps the air moving around in the garage so the gas heater isn't just keeping the top half of the garage warm!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: NO LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with light???? Listing clearly says with LIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $50
customer_reviews.text: For my work shop, doesn’t move much air, but for $50 I’m happy. Blades could use more pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Picture makes it appear that this fan comes with a light, but buyer beware....It does not.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: No air flow
customer_reviews.text: Fan has no air flow. Height is not adjustable. Built well . Old style mounting bracket which makes fan want to wobble
customer_reviews.author: Rowedog70

customer_reviews.title: cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Will work well in my garage with a high ceiling. Speed control is too large for the box available but one from my local Ace Hardware works fine.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Fairly cheap but you get what you pay for. Not sure I like the hanging system for these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: One fan came without hook to hang the fan with and trying to find one is not easy. The other fan went up pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: i made the best of it and it is working
customer_reviews.text: arrived as described how ever I did not realize that there is no light. i made the best of it and it is working fine
customer_reviews.author: john dsouza

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Does not move any air, and is VERY noisy! Would NOT buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fans for the price move a lot of air and are quiet
customer_reviews.author: robert pereira

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. There is no light , blades wobble if you put on high speed. Not an indoor type fan, I was going for an industrial look in soms room. This is for a warehouse or an oversized garage. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

product_meta.title: Hardware House 41-5976 Ceiling Fan, Gloss White
product_meta.description:
The Caribbean si an industrial style ceiling fan with 3 metal blades and a multi-speed wall control switch. Finish is gloss white and the blades are a matching white color.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Caribbean 56-Inch Industrial Ceiling Fan has Gloss White blades and body. The blades are metal and comes with a multi-speed wall control.
feature_bullets: Great for any office, shop or home
Moves a lot of air quietly
Note: This fan is not rated for outdoors and flush mount
